testcaseName: Hep B: Patient is 18 years and has received the second dose of the Hep B (Heplisav) vaccine at 4 weeks - 5 days
forecastTestType: Recommended based on minimum interval from invalid dose
generalDescription: This test case describes when a patient is administered the second dose of the Hep B (Heplisav) vaccine at 4 weeks - 5 days that the vaccine dose is not valid. A repeat dose is recommended.
reasonForChange: V3.5: Updated the earliest and recommended forecast to reflect 4 weeks after the second dose.
